name: Christmas Chaos (Timevortex, Trapper0711, blackblackberry)
description:
"Hey. You. You're finally awake. Your shift starts soon, get up. There are a lot of presents needing to be crafted, a lot of children await their gifts and we don't want to disappoint them. So get up and get to work! It's time to save Christmas"

In "Christmas Chaos" you are an elf in the Santa's workshop of. You get the wishlists of children from all around the world and you need to make their gifts in time before Santa leaves. In this game your skill to memorize reciepts and your time management are going to be put to a test. The clock is your enemy. Can you make all the children happy before time runs out and Christmas is ruined? There is only one way to find out.

To navigate in the menu use the WASD or the arrow keys, to select something use the spacebar.

This game was made by 3 people over the course of 2 weeks for the 32-bit holiday gamejam.

Submit your highscore
